performance_metrics.name: Yield (Bread Weight/Batch)
performance_metrics.description: Total weight of bread produced per batch, accounting for all loaf sizes and styles.

performance_metrics.name: Loaf Weight Variation (Standard Deviation)
performance_metrics.description: Statistical measure of loaf weight consistency across batches. Lower values indicate greater precision.

performance_metrics.name: Crumb Volume (cm³/g)
performance_metrics.description: Volume of air within the crumb structure of the bread. Higher values generally signify a lighter texture.

performance_metrics.name: Moisture Content (%)
performance_metrics.description: Percentage of water in the finished bread. Critical for shelf life and texture.

performance_metrics.name: Specific Volume (cm³/g)
performance_metrics.description: Volume occupied by a given mass of bread, related to texture and baking quality.

performance_metrics.name: Baking Time (minutes)
performance_metrics.description: Time from initial loading to completion of baking process. Varies based on dough hydration and loaf size.

performance_metrics.name: First Degree Thorn Color (Scale 1-5)
performance_metrics.description: Assessment of crust color, with 1 being pale and 5 being dark brown. Higher values generally indicate a desirable crust color.

implementation_requirements.name: Dough Mixer Capacity
implementation_requirements.description: Capacity of the dough mixer, influencing batch size and throughput.

implementation_requirements.name: Proofing Cabinet Temperature & Humidity
implementation_requirements.description: Precise control for yeast activity and dough development.

implementation_requirements.name: Deck Oven Capacity
implementation_requirements.description: Number of loaves baked simultaneously.  Determines oven loading strategy.

implementation_requirements.name: Dough Temperature (Initial)
implementation_requirements.description: Critical for yeast activation and dough development.

implementation_requirements.name: Cooling Tunnel Temperature
implementation_requirements.description: Maintaining a consistent temperature for cooling and preventing condensation.

implementation_requirements.name: Ingredient Storage Requirements
implementation_requirements.description: Maintaining ingredient quality and preventing spoilage.

implementation_requirements.name: Batch Size Control
implementation_requirements.description: Consistent ingredient ratios for repeatability and quality.
